title: Apple releases iOS 15.5 RC, here’s the list of everything new
content:
After over a month of beta testing, Apple has released iOS 15.5 RC to developers and public beta users. This suggests that the updates could be released to the public as soon as sometime next week. Head below for the full release notes…

more…

The post Apple releases iOS 15.5 RC, here’s the list of everything new appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After over a month of beta testing, Apple has released iOS 15.5 RC to beta users. Here is the full list of new features.
